subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] sounds like,

full_text:

I am starting to wonder if it isn't an audible scrying method. I am sure yo=
u have all heard of "scrying" - a person gazes into a reflective surface an=
d gets visions. These visions messages are from the Self - messages from yo=
ur subconscious.

Maybe listening to random noise can be an audible way of =
scrying.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: April Abercrombie 
  To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 8:23 AM
  Subject:=
 Re: [EVP-ITC] sounds like,





  =EF=BB=BF 

  This is a perfect example =
of how an EVP can be very personal as to what you get out of it.

    -----=
 Original Message ----- 
    From: SnowfireL@... 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 8:09 AM
    Subject: Re: [EVP=
-ITC] sounds like,



    Well, it sounds like my first name, and I hear th=
e word "faith" fairly well, it might be kind of pep talk maybe. Because bus=
iness for me has been really bad lately, and I don't know how I'm going to =
manage, got to seel some horse's, but it's a shabby market out there now.  =
As it's  been really hard to live for the past couple or years, and like ma=
ny other's I have too many bills, and no money to pay them.
    sf

    In =
a message dated 5/20/2009 9:25:47 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, april@abercro=
mbieghostresearch.com writes:



      =EF=BB=BF 

      Does that mean any=
thing to you?

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Snowfire=
L@... 
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, Ma=
y 20, 2009 6:40 AM
        Subject: [EVP-ITC] sounds like, [2 Attachments]
=



        a lady saying," Bonnie, Faith... Bonnie Faith", then this other =
was "use the truck." got this on FM band of the RS 20-125,
